00027 /* Derived 1/2009 from sources by Gonzalo Navarro and Antonio Fari√±a */

00029 #ifndef __SPACELESS_PARSER__
00030 #define __SPACELESS_PARSER__
00031 
00032 #include <stdlib.h>
00033 #include <stdio.h>
00034 #include <unistd.h>
00035 #include <string.h>
00036 #include <fcntl.h>
00037 #include <ctype.h>
00038 
00039 #define BUFFER_SIZE 10485760
00040 
00041 //MAX_ITEM_PARSED = longitud maxima de una palabra + 5
00042 #define MAX_ITEM_PARSED 524288
00043 
00044 #define byteType unsigned char
00045 
00046 /* Buffer management */
00047 typedef struct sBuffer {
00048     int size; 
00049     int file; 
00050     int fpos; 
00051     byteType *data; 
00052     int dsize; 
00053     int minDataInBuffer; /*  */
00054 }*Buffer;
00055 
00056 class SpacelessParser {
00057 private:
00058     int f; 
00059     Buffer B; 
00060     unsigned char *text, *top, *nextbuf;
00061     unsigned char *pbeg, *pend, *wordstart;
00062     unsigned long size;
00063 
00067     void bufCreate() {
00068         B = (Buffer) malloc(sizeof(struct sBuffer));
00069         B->size = BUFFER_SIZE;
00070         B->data = (byteType *) malloc(1 + B->size);
00071         B->data++;
00072         B->dsize = 0;
00073         B->minDataInBuffer = MAX_ITEM_PARSED;
00074     }
00075 
00079     void bufDestroy() {
00080         free(B->data - 1);
00081         free(B);
00082     }
00083 
00088     void bufSetFile(int file) {
00089         B->file = file;
00090         B->fpos = 0;
00091         B->dsize = read(B->file, B->data, B->size);
00092     }
00093 
00097     int bufSize() {
00098         return B->size;
00099     }
00100 
00104     void bufLoad() {
00105         register byteType *src = nextbuf;
00106         register byteType *dst = B->data;
00107         register int mov = B->dsize - (src - dst);
00108 
00109         /* move unused part to the beginning (memcpy is not portable) */
00110         B->dsize = mov;
00111 
00112         while (mov--)
00113             *dst++ = *src++;
00114         mov = B->size - B->dsize;
00115         B->dsize += read(B->file, dst, mov);
00116         B->fpos += mov;
00117 
00119     }
00120 
00124     int bufEmpty() {
00125         return B->dsize == 0;
00126     }
00127 
00128     /* Tells whether there is no more data to read in B's file
00129      * @return The expected result
00130      */
00131     int bufEof() {
00132         return B->dsize < B->size;
00133     }
00134 
00135     /* Tells the file position of the current buffer
00136      * @return The expected result
00137      */
00138     int bufTextPos() {
00139         return B->fpos;
00140     }
00141 
00142     /* Gives the area of memory of the current buffer one text position before the given buffer can be touched
00143      * @return void
00144      */
00145     void bufCurrent() {
00146         text = B->data;
00147         if (!bufEof()) {
00148             top = B->data + B->dsize - B->minDataInBuffer;
00149         } else {
00150             top = B->data + B->dsize;
00151         }
00152     }
00153 
00154 public:
00155     char * aWord;
00156     int separator;
00157 
00159     SpacelessParser() {
00160         aWord = (char *) malloc(1 + MAX_ITEM_PARSED);
00161         B = NULL;
00162         f = -1;
00163     }
00164 
00166     ~SpacelessParser() {
00167         bufDestroy();
00168         free(aWord);
00169         if (f != -1)
00170             close(f);
00171     }
00172 
00178     bool InitParser(char * infile, int separator) {
00179         this->separator = separator;
00180 
00181         // Initialization of read buffer
00182         f = open(infile, O_RDONLY);
00183         if (f == -1) {
00184             fprintf(stderr, "Cannot read file %s\n", infile);
00185             return false;
00186         }
00187         bufCreate();
00188         bufSetFile(f);
00189         bufCurrent();
00190         pbeg = text;
00191         pend = top;
00192         return true;
00193     }
00194 
00198     bool ParseWord() {
00199         char marker = separator;
00200         while (B->size == B->dsize) {
00201             while (pbeg < pend) {
00202                 //parsing a word or separator
00203                 size = 0;
00204                 wordstart = pbeg;
00205 
00206                 //alphanumerical data
00207                 while ((size < MAX_ITEM_PARSED) && (*pbeg != marker)) {
00208                     size++;
00209                     pbeg++;
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 memcpy(aWord, wordstart, size);
00213                 aWord[size] = '\0';
00214                 pbeg++;
00215                 return true;
00216             }
00217 
00218             if (bufEof())
00219                 nextbuf = top;
00220             else
00221                 nextbuf = pbeg;
00222 
00223             bufLoad();
00224             bufCurrent();
00225             pbeg = text;
00226             pend = top;
00227         }
00228 
00229         if (!bufEmpty()) {
00230             while (pbeg < pend) {
00231                 size = 0;
00232                 wordstart = pbeg;
00233 
00234                 //alphanumerical data
00235                 while ((size < MAX_ITEM_PARSED) && (*pbeg != marker) && (pbeg
00236                         < pend)) {
00237                     size++;
00238                     pbeg++;
00239                 }
00240 
00241                 if (pbeg >= pend) {
00242                     //need in case of the last word been parsed further away of cend.
00243                     size -= (pbeg - pend);
00244                 }
00245 
00246                 memcpy(aWord, wordstart, size);
00247                 aWord[size] = '\0';
00248                 pbeg++;
00249                 return true;
00250             }
00251         }
00252         return false;
00253     }
00254 };
00255 
00256 #endif
